about_the_game:
The Legend Of The Crystals is an immersive, story-driven fantasy action RPG that takes you on an epic journey of discovery and heroism. In a world on the brink of collapse, a young boy is thrust into a struggle for survival as he joins a group of skilled warriors to uncover the secrets of ancient, powerful crystals. These mysterious artifacts hold the key to saving their world from an impending darkness, but the path to understanding their true power is fraught with danger.

Engage in real-time combat and explore vast, beautifully crafted landscapes. As you unravel the crystal’s mysteries, you'll face challenging enemies and uncover hidden lore. Will you unlock the crystals full potential, or will the forces of darkness claim them first? The fate of the world rests in your hands.
